events.message: I received the laptop yesterday, but the screen has several deep scratches that were not mentioned in the product description.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect related to physical damage on the device's display.
The case has been assigned to an agent specialized in product damage claims for further assistance.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the scratches on your laptop screen. I’m here to help get this resolved.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen as well as your order number so we can verify and process your claim?
Attached are the photos showing the scratches on the screen, and my order number is ORD1234567. Please advise on the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We can send you a replacement laptop free of charge or offer a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know your choice.
I would prefer a replacement laptop, thank you. I appreciate the swift response and solution proposed.
Your replacement laptop has been shipped today with a tracking number provided by email. You should receive it within 3-5 business days.
We are checking in to ensure you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is in perfect condition.
The replacement arrived today and it looks brand new with no defects. Thanks again for your help!
We are glad your issue was resolved satisfactorily. Closing this case now, feel free to contact us again if needed.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
